Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    This class is used whenever we want to have a background image on GUI frames.
    GameOver
    This class sets GUI for gameOver state Whenever the game is over, we create an object of this class
    LoadBoard
    This class creates the UI for game loading ability.
    MainMenu
    This class handles start page and main menu page GUI first the player is asked to enter a username and then the player is directed to the main page, main menu is also managed here.
    PauseMenu
    This class creates UI for pause menu and adds needed buttons.
    Scoreboard
    This class creates UI for scoreboard.
    Settings
    This class keeps all settings components and creates the frame.
    User
    This class creates UI for handling user sign up, login and change username ability.
